lead_paragraph: Barcelona are convinced Brazil captain Neymar will commit his long-term future to the Nou Camp as protracted negotiations between the Spanish champions and the striker continue over an extension to his current deal, which expires in June 2018.

headline.print_headline: Barca Confident Neymar Will Commit to Long-Term Deal
headline.main: Barca Confident Neymar Will Commit to Long-Term Deal
